entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
